description: All served with soft vanilla ice cream or whipped cream.

plates.name: Icy Croissant
plates.description: A croissant filled with your choice of ice cream, drizzled with pistachio cream and milk chocolate.

plates.name: Le Croockie
plates.description: Flaky golden and buttery croissants stuffed with chocolate chip cookie dough and topped with more dough, baked until chewy and fudgy, drizzled with white or milk chocolate.

plates.name: Le Croffle
plates.description: A combination of waffle and croissant, crunchy and caramelized, drizzled with choice of chocolate milk or pistachio cream.

plates.name: Cookie Dough Pistachio & Kunafa
plates.description: A warm cookie dough topped with kunafa & pistachio sauce, and served with ice cream.

plates.name: Chocolat Blanc
plates.description: Soft and freshly baked white chocolate chip cookie dough drizzled in Belgian milk chocolate sauce and topped with chocolate curls.

plates.name: Oreo Time
plates.description: Soft and freshly baked milk chocolate chip cookie dough drizzled in Belgian white chocolate sauce and topped with Oreo crumbs and Oreo biscuit.

plates.name: La Pistachio Cookie
plates.description: Soft and freshly baked milk chocolate chip cookie dough drizzled in pistachio and topped with pistachio crumbles.

description: Delicious burgers served in brioche buns with fries.

plates.name: Classic Smash Burger
plates.description: Two 3oz Aberdeen angus beef patties smashed and topped with caramelized onions, American cheese, gherkins, and a Branché house-made sauce, served in a seeded brioche bun with fries.

plates.name: Peri Chicken Burger
plates.description: Succulent fillet marinated in peri sauce and topped with fresh lettuce, gherkins, tomatoes, red onions, and cheese, served in a brioche bun with fries.

plates.name: Veggie Burger
plates.description: Fried veggie patty, topped with lettuce, garlic mayo, gherkins, tomato, and cheese, served in a brioche bun with fries.

plates.name: Halloumi Burger
plates.description: Lightly grilled Halloumi, lettuce, tomato, and red onions, drizzled in a sweet and spicy chilli and mayo sauce, in a lightly toasted brioche bun with fries.

plates.name: Buttermilk Fried Chicken Burger
plates.description: Buttermillk crispy fried chicken fillet, topped with lettuce, gherkins, melted American cheese, and an in-house garlic mayo sauce, served in a brioche bun with fries.

description: Fresh and healthy salads with homemade dressings.

plates.name: Halloumi Salad
plates.description: Mixed salad leaves, cherry tomatoes, grilled halloumi drizzled with our homemade dressing.

plates.name: Chicken Salad
plates.description: Marinated grilled chicken, salad, olives, tomatoes, cucumber, drizzled with our homemade dressing.

description: Crispy fries loaded with delicious toppings and our legendary melted cheese sauce.

plates.description: Fries topped with marinated chicken, crispy chicken, garlic mayo, and our legendary melted cheese sauce.

plates.name: Frenchy Loaded Fries
plates.description: Fries topped with minced beef, cordon bleu, BBQ sauce, and our legendary melted cheese sauce.

plates.name: Special Loaded Fries

plates.name: Spicy Loaded Fries
plates.description: Fries topped with crispy chicken, cordon bleu, turkey bacon, crispy onions, harissa, and our legendary melted cheese sauce.

plates.name: Loaded Fries

plates.name: XXL French Tacos to Share
plates.description: Large French tacos to share, customizable with your choice of meats and sauces.

plates.name: Build Your Own Taco (Medium)
plates.description: Customizable medium-sized tacos with your choice of fillings and sauces. Includes 2 meats of your choice. Choose from: Marinated Chicken, Crispy Chicken, Minced Beef, Cordon Bleu (*Breaded chicken stuffed with cheese and turkey ham). Available sauces: Mayo, Garlic Mayo, Ketchup, BBQ, Piri Piri, Harissa, Algerian Sauce.

plates.name: Build Your Own Taco (Large)
plates.description: Customizable large-sized tacos with your choice of fillings and sauces. Double tortilla + 3 meats of your choice. Choose from: Marinated Chicken, Crispy Chicken, Minced Beef, Cordon Bleu (*Breaded chicken stuffed with cheese and turkey ham). Available sauces: Mayo, Garlic Mayo, Ketchup, BBQ, Piri Piri, Harissa, Algerian Sauce.

description: Indulgent French toasts with various flavors and toppings.

plates.name: Classic French Toast
plates.description: Served with maple syrup, fresh berries, and soft ice cream.

plates.name: Tiramisu French Toast
plates.description: Brioche French toast infused with coffee, layered with creamy mascarpone, dusted with cocoa, and served with fresh berries.

plates.name: Lotus & Banana Brûlée
plates.description: Brioche French toast served with caramelized banana, Lotus Biscoff sauce, fresh berries, and soft ice cream.

plates.name: Pistachio French Toast
plates.description: French toast filled with pistachio cream, served with fresh berries, pistachio sauce, and soft ice cream.

plates.name: Dubai Chocolate French Toast
plates.description: Brioche French toast topped with Dubai chocolate, served with pistachio sauce.

plates.name: Pistachio Tiramisu French Toast
plates.description: Rich coffee-soaked French toast layered with creamy pistachio mascarpone, topped with crushed pistachios.

description: Our exclusive signature drinks crafted for an unforgettable experience.

plates.name: Full English Breakfast

plates.name: Crème Brûlée

plates.name: Branché Edition
